resources.string:
Thankyou for using Logos Quiz App '24. Prepare for Logos Quiz and share this app with others.
Kindly share your valuable feedback to us.

\"Logos Bible Quiz\" is a Quiz Program organized every year by KCBC\'s Bible Commission. The Logos Bible Quiz App an Interactive Quiz that tests your Biblical knowledge. \nEach level is named after the bible chapters, that is available for the upcoming Logos Quiz. Each question carries 1 mark and there is no negative marks. You can attend any chapter at any time. There is no limits to number of attempts. \nThis app is the only one on the Play Store focusing specifically on the Malayalam Bible quiz, offering unique value to users.
This app is developed and maintained by ecSolution
We don\'t share your information to any third parties. Whatever we collect stays in your phone
There is a lot of time and effort behind this app development. And this app is free to use. You can support us by your small donations. \nUPI:ecsolution@cnrb (Jomit M P)
